data.title: SOS OCEAN: HELP FOR AN ENDANGERED HABITAT
data.meta_description: It was a real pleasure to be the DOP for the African portion of the German prime-time documentary “SOS Ocean (SOS Ozean): Help for an endangered habitat” for ZDF. The documentary follows the work of people around the world who are committed to protecting the oceans. In projects that sometimes start small but have a big impact.
data.text:
It was a real pleasure to be the DOP for the African portion of the German prime-time documentary “SOS Ocean (SOS Ozean): Help for an endangered habitat” for ZDF. The documentary follows the work of people around the world who are committed to protecting the oceans. In projects that sometimes start small but have a big impact.

My German speaking friends can watch the documentary here: https://www.zdf.de/gesellschaft/plan-b/plan-b-sos-ozean-104.html

Thanks to all that helped with the project.

TESTIMONIAL

"Chris filmed for the German public TV prime-time documentary “SOS Ocean: Help for an endangered habitat”. Therefore the visual demands could not have been higher. His camerawork was outstanding, as was his passionate commitment to telling non-fictional stories about conservation issues in a respectful and engaging manner. I could not have had a better DOP in Africa. I enjoyed every minute."
